name: d3-axis
description: Displays automatic reference lines for scales.

scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-axis/build/d3-axis.js d3-axis.v1.js && cp ../d3-axis/build/d3-axis.min.js d3-axis.v1.min.js && git add d3-axis.v1.js d3-axis.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-axis ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-axis.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-axis.js build/d3-axis.min.js
